snippet: Monday’s announcement of this fall’s moderators were met with complaints about a lack of diversity and other choices seen as “safe.”
abstract: Announcement of the moderators for the presidential and vice-presidential debates is greeted with criticism, particularly about the lack of diversity among the moderators.

byline.original: By BRIAN STELTER and MICHAEL D. SHEAR
byline.contributor:
Brian Stelter reported from New
York, and Michael Shear from
Washington.

lead_paragraph: Monday’s announcement of this fall’s moderators were met with complaints about a lack of diversity and other choices seen as “safe.”

headline.main: Criticism Greets List of Debate Moderators
headline.print_headline: Criticism Greets List of Debate Moderators
